text: (nabiye!) kavurun (paralovadi) tamange deviyan veta (viniscaya sandaha) ekarasi karanu labannemu yayi biya vannehuda, ovun (papayen æt vi) parisuddhavantayin bavata pat vima pinisa, ovunta oba anuturu angavanu. ovunta (edina) udav karannekuda, ovun venuven mædihat vannekuda, ohu misa (vena kisivekut) næta
